p:
Fatty acid composition of edible oils and fats is important from the technological and nutritional points of view. Therefore, one of the main analyses in oils and fats field is fatty acid composition. Results show that fatty acid compositions of flaxseed, sesame and olive oils used in this study are in agreement with previously published data.
16 Sesame and olive oils had very low amounts of linolenic acid, but flaxseed was a rich source of linolenic acid ( Table 1).
